Title: Relates to the persons authorized to visit facilities operated by the department of social services or a social services district and homeless projects
Summary: Specifies the persons authorized to visit facilities operated by the department of social services or a social services district and homeless projects; amends the definition of homeless project.
LawCode: Amd ยง42, add ยง40-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to persons authorized to visit facilities operated by the department of social services or a social services district and homeless projects
